Notes: An area that can be used to change the color of all object shadows when entered by the player.

Obj_arg0.Name: Red
Obj_arg0.Description: The red color component. Ranges from 0 to 255 inclusive.

Obj_arg1.Name: Green
Obj_arg1.Description: The green color component. Ranges from 0 to 255 inclusive.

Obj_arg2.Name: Blue
Obj_arg2.Description: The blue color component. Ranges from 0 to 255 inclusive.

SW_APPEAR.Description: The object will appear when this switch is activated.

SW_AWAKE.Description: The object will become visible and resume movement when this switch is activated.

BaseMtxFollower.Description: Objects of this class can follow another BaseMtxFollowTarget object.
